question: 请解释这句话：BankPromotionsEarn up to 2.5% p.a. on first S$100,000Simply open a new Multiplier account, credit your salary and spend with us! Why settle for less when you can enjoy more?Open a Multiplier account and get up to 2.5% p.a. on your first S$100,000 from 1 Sep till 31 Dec 2025. What’s more, stack on rewards of up to S$680 for even sweeter returns when you credit your salary and sign up for the DBS yuu Card!Already have a DBS yuu Card? New to Multiplier? He maintains a daily balance of at least S$100,000 in his newly opened Multiplier account throughout the promotion period.He also credits his monthly salary of S$3,500 to his DBS/POSB savings account and spends S$500 on Credit Card/PayLah! Retail Spend every month.Jack has a total eligible transaction of S$4,000 monthly. As part of the promotion, he earns interest of 2.10% p.a. instead of 1.80% p.a. on his first S$100,000 savings in his Multiplier account.The interest is credited to him in 3 parts:Last calendar day0.05% p.a. base interest on Multiplier Account’s SGD balance7th working day of following month1.75% p.a. bonus interest on the first S$50,000By the end of following month0.30% p.a. bonus interest on the first S$50,000 as well as 2.05% p.a. on the next S$50,000Sweeten your returns with rewards worth up to S$680!On top of the bonus interest that you can earn with Multiplier, we’ve got two other big carrots for you: Get S$300 cash reward by salary creditingHaven’t credited your salary with us before or it’s been a while?Register for this promotion and credit your salary into any DBS/POSB account for 3 consecutive months to get S$300 cash reward.Register nowTerms & Conditions apply.Get up to S$380 cash rewards with DBS yuu CardSign up for the DBS yuu Card by 31 Dec 2025 and get up to S$380 cash rewards.Plus, get up to 18% cash rebates on your groceries and daily spend when you pay with the DBS yuu Card at over 1,000 stores islandwide!Already have a DBS yuu Card? Why settle for less when you can enjoy more?Open a Multiplier account and get up to 2.5% p.a. on your first S$100,000 from 1 Sep till 31 Dec 2025. What’s more, stack on rewards of up to S$680 for even sweeter returns when you credit your salary and sign up for the DBS yuu Card!Already have a DBS yuu Card? If your card was approved before 1 Oct 2025, you can get S$10 in yuu Points every month by fulfilling the Multiplier promotion criteria and making at least one transaction on your DBS yuu Card each week. New to Multiplier? Earn up to 2.5% p.a. today!Here’s how:Open a Multiplier accountBring in fresh funds and maintain a daily balance of at least S$100,000 in your Multiplier account throughout the promotion periodCredit your salary via GIRO to any DBS/POSB account and transact in any one of the Multiplier categoriesRefer here for the Terms and conditions and Frequently asked questions. How it worksYou will still earn base interest on the SGD balance that don’t meet the eligible transactions criteria or exceed the balance cap.Apply now ExampleMeet Jack. He has opened a Multiplier account on 1 Sep 2025. He maintains a daily balance of at least S$100,000 in his newly opened Multiplier account throughout the promotion period.He also credits his monthly salary of S$3,500 to his DBS/POSB savings account and spends S$500 on Credit Card/PayLah! Retail Spend every month.Jack has a total eligible transaction of S$4,000 monthly. As part of the promotion, he earns interest of 2.10% p.a. instead of 1.80% p.a. on his first S$100,000 savings in his Multiplier account.The interest is credited to him in 3 parts:Last calendar day0.05% p.a. base interest on Multiplier Account’s SGD balance7th working day of following month1.75% p.a. bonus interest on the first S$50,000By the end of following month0.30% p.a. bonus interest on the first S$50,000 as well as 2.05% p.a. on the next S$50,000Sweeten your returns with rewards worth up to S$680!On top of the bonus interest that you can earn with Multiplier, we’ve got two other big carrots for you: Get S$300 cash reward by salary creditingHaven’t credited your salary with us before or it’s been a while?Register for this promotion and credit your salary into any DBS/POSB account for 3 consecutive months to get S$300 cash reward.Register nowTerms & Conditions apply.Get up to S$380 cash rewards with DBS yuu CardSign up for the DBS yuu Card by 31 Dec 2025 and get up to S$380 cash rewards.Plus, get up to 18% cash rebates on your groceries and daily spend when you pay with the DBS yuu Card at over 1,000 stores islandwide!Already have a DBS yuu Card? If your card was approved before 1 Oct 2025, you can get S$10 in yuu Points every month by fulfilling the Multiplier promotion criteria and making at least one transaction on your DBS yuu Card each week.Learn moreTerms & Conditions apply.Transacting more with us? New to Multiplier? Earn up to 2.5% p.a. today!Here’s how:Open a Multiplier accountBring in fresh funds and maintain a daily balance of at least S$100,000 in your Multiplier account throughout the promotion periodCredit your salary via GIRO to any DBS/POSB account and transact in any one of the Multiplier categoriesRefer here for the Terms and conditions and Frequently asked questions. How it worksYou will still earn base interest on the SGD balance that don’t meet the eligible transactions criteria or exceed the balance cap.Apply now ExampleMeet Jack. He has opened a Multiplier account on 1 Sep 2025. He maintains a daily balance of at least S$100,000 in his newly opened Multiplier account throughout the promotion period.He also credits his monthly salary of S$3,500 to his DBS/POSB savings account and spends S$500 on Credit Card/PayLah! Retail Spend every month.Jack has a total eligible transaction of S$4,000 monthly. As part of the promotion, he earns interest of 2.10% p.a. instead of 1.80% p.a. on his first S$100,000 savings in his Multiplier account.The interest is credited to him in 3 parts:Last calendar day0.05% p.a. base interest on Multiplier Account’s SGD balance7th working day of following month1.75% p.a. bonus interest on the first S$50,000By the end of following month0.30% p.a. bonus interest on the first S$50,000 as well as 2.05% p.a. on the next S$50,000Sweeten your returns with rewards worth up to S$680!On top of the bonus interest that you can earn with Multiplier, we’ve got two other big carrots for you: Get S$300 cash reward by salary creditingHaven’t credited your salary with us before or it’s been a while?Register for this promotion and credit your salary into any DBS/POSB account for 3 consecutive months to get S$300 cash reward.Register nowTerms & Conditions apply.Get up to S$380 cash rewards with DBS yuu CardSign up for the DBS yuu Card by 31 Dec 2025 and get up to S$380 cash rewards.Plus, get up to 18% cash rebates on your groceries and daily spend when you pay with the DBS yuu Card at over 1,000 stores islandwide!Already have a DBS yuu Card? If your card was approved before 1 Oct 2025, you can get S$10 in yuu Points every month by fulfilling the Multiplier promotion criteria and making at least one transaction on your DBS yuu Card each week.Learn moreTerms & Conditions apply.Transacting more with us? Continue to enjoy up to 4.1% p.a. with your Multiplier accountWhen you credit your salary, spend, invest, insure and take up a home loan with DBS/POSB.Learn moreTerms & Conditions apply. Ready to hop over? Apply for Multiplier now!Open a Multiplier Account instantly on digibank appSingaporeans, Permanent Residents, and Foreigners (EP/SP/DP /Long Term Visit Pass/Student Pass) can open a Multiplier Account instantly with Singpass.Download digibank appOn POSB? Click here to apply.Tapping the button above will direct you via OneLink to an app store, a third-party site, to download digibank. Read our disclaimer on accessing third-party sites here.Alternatively, launch your digibank app, tap on More and tap on Deposit Accounts under the Apply section. Deposit Insurance SchemeSingapore dollar deposits of non-bank depositors and monies and deposits denominated in Singapore dollars under the Supplementary Retirement Scheme are insured by the Singapore Deposit Insurance Corporation, for up to S$100,000 in aggregate per depositor per Scheme member by law. Monies and deposits denominated in Singapore dollars under the CPF Investment Scheme and CPF Retirement Sum Scheme are aggregated and separately insured up to S$100,000 for each depositor per Scheme member. Foreign currency deposits, dual currency investments, structured deposits and other investment products are not insured. Why settle for less when you can enjoy more?Open a Multiplier account and get up to 2.5% p.a. on your first S$100,000 from 1 Sep till 31 Dec 2025. What’s more, stack on rewards of up to S$680 for even sweeter returns when you credit your salary and sign up for the DBS yuu Card!Already have a DBS yuu Card? If your card was approved before 1 Oct 2025, you can get S$10 in yuu Points every month by fulfilling the Multiplier promotion criteria and making at least one transaction on your DBS yuu Card each week. New to Multiplier? Earn up to 2.5% p.a. today!Here’s how:Open a Multiplier accountBring in fresh funds and maintain a daily balance of at least S$100,000 in your Multiplier account throughout the promotion periodCredit your salary via GIRO to any DBS/POSB account and transact in any one of the Multiplier categoriesRefer here for the Terms and conditions and Frequently asked questions. How it worksYou will still earn base interest on the SGD balance that don’t meet the eligible transactions criteria or exceed the balance cap.Apply now ExampleMeet Jack. He has opened a Multiplier account on 1 Sep 2025. He maintains a daily balance of at least S$100,000 in his newly opened Multiplier account throughout the promotion period.He also credits his monthly salary of S$3,500 to his DBS/POSB savings account and spends S$500 on Credit Card/PayLah! Retail Spend every month.Jack has a total eligible transaction of S$4,000 monthly. As part of the promotion, he earns interest of 2.10% p.a. instead of 1.80% p.a. on his first S$100,000 savings in his Multiplier account.The interest is credited to him in 3 parts:Last calendar day0.05% p.a. base interest on Multiplier Account’s SGD balance7th working day of following month1.75% p.a. bonus interest on the first S$50,000By the end of following month0.30% p.a. bonus interest on the first S$50,000 as well as 2.05% p.a. on the next S$50,000Sweeten your returns with rewards worth up to S$680!On top of the bonus interest that you can earn with Multiplier, we’ve got two other big carrots for you: Get S$300 cash reward by salary creditingHaven’t credited your salary with us before or it’s been a while?Register for this promotion and credit your salary into any DBS/POSB account for 3 consecutive months to get S$300 cash reward.Register nowTerms & Conditions apply.Get up to S$380 cash rewards with DBS yuu CardSign up for the DBS yuu Card by 31 Dec 2025 and get up to S$380 cash rewards.Plus, get up to 18% cash rebates on your groceries and daily spend when you pay with the DBS yuu Card at over 1,000 stores islandwide!Already have a DBS yuu Card? If your card was approved before 1 Oct 2025, you can get S$10 in yuu Points every month by fulfilling the Multiplier promotion criteria and making at least one transaction on your DBS yuu Card each week.Learn moreTerms & Conditions apply.Transacting more with us? Continue to enjoy up to 4.1% p.a. with your Multiplier accountWhen you credit your salary, spend, invest, insure and take up a home loan with DBS/POSB.Learn moreTerms & Conditions apply. Ready to hop over? Apply for Multiplier now!Open a Multiplier Account instantly on digibank appSingaporeans, Permanent Residents, and Foreigners (EP/SP/DP /Long Term Visit Pass/Student Pass) can open a Multiplier Account instantly with Singpass.Download digibank appOn POSB? Click here to apply.Tapping the button above will direct you via OneLink to an app store, a third-party site, to download digibank. Read our disclaimer on accessing third-party sites here.Alternatively, launch your digibank app, tap on More and tap on Deposit Accounts under the Apply section. Deposit Insurance SchemeSingapore dollar deposits of non-bank depositors and monies and deposits denominated in Singapore dollars under the Supplementary Retirement Scheme are insured by the Singapore Deposit Insurance Corporation, for up to S$100,000 in aggregate per depositor per Scheme member by law. Monies and deposits denominated in Singapore dollars under the CPF Investment Scheme and CPF Retirement Sum Scheme are aggregated and separately insured up to S$100,000 for each depositor per Scheme member. Foreign currency deposits, dual currency investments, structured deposits and other investment products are not insured. He has opened a Multiplier account on 1 Sep 2025. He maintains a daily balance of at least S$100,000 in his newly opened Multiplier account throughout the promotion period.He also credits his monthly salary of S$3,500 to his DBS/POSB savings account and spends S$500 on Credit Card/PayLah! Retail Spend every month.Jack has a total eligible transaction of S$4,000 monthly. As part of the promotion, he earns interest of 2.10% p.a. instead of 1.80% p.a. on his first S$100,000 savings in his Multiplier account.The interest is credited to him in 3 parts:Last calendar day0.05% p.a. base interest on Multiplier Account’s SGD balance7th working day of following month1.75% p.a. bonus interest on the first S$50,000By the end of following month0.30% p.a. bonus interest on the first S$50,000 as well as 2.05% p.a. on the next S$50,000Sweeten your returns with rewards worth up to S$680!On top of the bonus interest that you can earn with Multiplier, we’ve got two other big carrots for you: Get S$300 cash reward by salary creditingHaven’t credited your salary with us before or it’s been a while?Register for this promotion and credit your salary into any DBS/POSB account for 3 consecutive months to get S$300 cash reward.Register nowTerms & Conditions apply.Get up to S$380 cash rewards with DBS yuu CardSign up for the DBS yuu Card by 31 Dec 2025 and get up to S$380 cash rewards.Plus, get up to 18% cash rebates on your groceries and daily spend when you pay with the DBS yuu Card at over 1,000 stores islandwide!Already have a DBS yuu Card? If your card was approved before 1 Oct 2025, you can get S$10 in yuu Points every month by fulfilling the Multiplier promotion criteria and making at least one transaction on your DBS yuu Card each week.Learn moreTerms & Conditions apply.Transacting more with us? Continue to enjoy up to 4.1% p.a. with your Multiplier accountWhen you credit your salary, spend, invest, insure and take up a home loan with DBS/POSB.Learn moreTerms & Conditions apply. Ready to hop over? Apply for Multiplier now!Open a Multiplier Account instantly on digibank appSingaporeans, Permanent Residents, and Foreigners (EP/SP/DP /Long Term Visit Pass/Student Pass) can open a Multiplier Account instantly with Singpass.Download digibank appOn POSB? Click here to apply.Tapping the button above will direct you via OneLink to an app store, a third-party site, to download digibank. Read our disclaimer on accessing third-party sites here.Alternatively, launch your digibank app, tap on More and tap on Deposit Accounts under the Apply section. Deposit Insurance SchemeSingapore dollar deposits of non-bank depositors and monies and deposits denominated in Singapore dollars under the Supplementary Retirement Scheme are insured by the Singapore Deposit Insurance Corporation, for up to S$100,000 in aggregate per depositor per Scheme member by law. Monies and deposits denominated in Singapore dollars under the CPF Investment Scheme and CPF Retirement Sum Scheme are aggregated and separately insured up to S$100,000 for each depositor per Scheme member. Foreign currency deposits, dual currency investments, structured deposits and other investment products are not insured. question: 请解释这句话：BankDigital ServicesSecuring your banking transactionsDBS Scam DefenceACT to get the upper hand over scammers.At a GlanceArming you with knowledgePutting security at your fingertipsWatching over your money 24/7BankDigital ServicesSecuring your banking transactionsDBS Scam DefenceNeed help? Just reach out to us.If you suspect a scam, call our DBS Fraud Hotline at 1800 339 6963 (in Singapore) or +65 6339 6963 (from abroad).At a GlanceArming you with knowledgeWe keep you informed and updated on the latest scams, online and on-ground in your community.Putting security at your fingertipsStay a step ahead of scammers with our suite of security tools in digibank.Watching over your money 24/7Our dedicated teams and surveillance systems work around the clock to safeguard your savings.Your security is our priority. DBS Scam Defence is our multi-layered approach to protecting your money. Our advanced technology and dedicated teams work hand-in-hand around the clock to safeguard your money, while we equip you with the tools and knowledge to stay alert and protect yourself.Our efforts are in line with the Singapore Police Force and National Crime Prevention Council's ACT initiative – Add, Check, Tell – empowering everyone to spot scams early and stay safe.Arming you with knowledgeKnowing how to spot scams can make a big difference. We bring scam education to where you are and also work with government and community partners such as SPF, CSA and IMDA to scale our reach, making anti-scam education more accessible.Scam education in the communityAnti-scam education is built into many of our community touchpoints – from pop-up events to sessions held in our branches – reaching people where they live and gather. In 2023, we launched our POSB Your Neighbourhood Getai series, where scam prevention tips are woven into lively Getai shows, making it easy for active agers and heartland residents to learn about scams. Together with IMDA, we also regularly run digital literacy and anti-scam workshops in neighbourhoods across Singapore. Scam Defence HubOur Scam Defence Hub is your one-stop space for scam awareness. It houses the latest scam alerts, explanations of how common scams work, and practical guides to help you stay protected. Check it out to learn how to better safeguard yourself against scams.Putting security at your fingertipsStay a step ahead of scammers with simple, powerful security tools in digibank. Elevate your security today with four easy actions:Set transaction limits and alertsVisit 'Security Checkup' to set your transaction and payment limits – so even if someone steals your login details, they can't move large sums. Remember to also update your contact details and switch on banking alerts so you can be notified of any suspicious activity.Step 1Log in to digibank mobileStep 2Tap on MoreStep 3Tap on Security Checkup Customise your transaction alert preferences and threshold limits with just a few taps on digibank mobile so you’re informed of all your account activities.Step 1Log in to your digibank, tap on MoreStep 2Under App & Security Settings, tap Manage NotificationsStep 3Customise your alert preferences and threshold limits, tap NextStep 4Review your details and tap DoneCheck for unexpected activity and alertsSpotting a scam early makes all the difference. Log into digibank to regularly review your bank account and card statements. If something doesn't look right, report it to us immediately via our Fraud Hotline at 1800 339 6963.Protect your card(s) with Payment ControlsTake charge of how your cards are used. With Payment Controls, you can enable or disable e-commerce, contactless, overseas and other key transaction types – so you stay in control of every transaction.Step 1 Log in to digibank mobile with your Touch / Face ID or User ID & PINStep 2 Under Home, tap MoreStep 3 Under Manage Cards & Loans, select Payment ControlsStep 4 Select the Card you wish to customise and toggle switch on/offLock your money with digiVaultAdd an extra layer of protection to your savings. With digiVault, you can lock a selected portion of your funds so they cannot be digitally transferred out – even if scammers trick you into sharing your details. Only you can unlock the funds by visiting a DBS/POSB branch or ATM, keeping your savings untouchable by anyone but yourself. How to lock funds in your current and/or savings account(s)Log in to digibank mobile, under Deposits, select your Current/Savings Account Tap Lock with digiVault Tap Lock an Amount and enter the amount you wish to lock Review your details and tap Submit How to lock your Fixed DepositsLog in to digibank mobile, under Deposits, select your Fixed Deposit AccountTap Lock with digiVault and select the placement you wish to lock Review your details and tap Submit How to set up a separate account for lockingLog in to digibank mobile.Tap on the More tab.Select the digiVault under Apply.Follow the steps and start transferring funds in after confirmation.To date, more than 1.5 million customers are already protecting their money with these tools. Don't wait – take control of your security today.Watching over your money 24/7Alongside empowering you with security tools, our dedicated Anti-Scam Team and frontline staff work together to safeguard your money. Specialist Anti-Scam TeamMade up of fraud prevention specialists trained to spot the early signs of scam activity, this dedicated unit reviews high-risk transactions flagged by our fraud monitoring systems and works to protect customers from scams.Frontline staff on alertOur branch and customer service teams undergo regular training to recognise warning signs of scams. They watch for common red flags and if something seems off, they’ll pause the transaction and ask clarifying questions —helping to protect your money before any funds leave your account.24/7 Fraud Monitoring SystemsOur advanced surveillance systems run round-the-clock to detect unusual activity. If something suspicious is flagged, we’ll contact you and may temporarily block transactions to keep your funds safe.Visit our Scam Defence Hub for more online banking safety tips and stay vigilant against scams. You can also keep yourself protected with safeguards such as Safety Switch and the ScamShield app. What Safety Switch doesCall the DBS Fraud Hotline to activate Safety Switch. This instantly disables your digibank Online and Mobile access, DBS PayLah! and all cards, blocking all digital transactions – including local and overseas transfers – until you decide to lift the lock. It’s the fastest way to freeze activity if you think your account details have been compromised.Lock scammers out with the ScamShield appDownload the official ScamShield app to block scam calls and SMSes, as well as report scam calls. It also filters calls based on a list maintained by the Singapore Police Force.RelatedSecurity CheckupStop the phish with DBS Payment ControlsLock your money like you lock your valuablesLet's bank safely togetherExplore moreProtectionSavingsEducationLearnSecurityCybersecurityUseful LinksDeposits GuideDeposit Insurance SchemeTerms & Conditions Governing AccountsLimited Purpose Bank AccountTerms & Conditions Governing Electronic ServicesCheque Deposit FAQsBest Execution PolicyOthersBank, Branch & Transaction CodesFormsRates & ToolsSecurity & YouScheduled MaintenanceUpdate Personal ParticularsLasting Power of AttorneyNeed Help?Help & Support PortalPhone - 1800 111 1111Get In Touch with UsMarketsSingaporeHong KongIndiaIndonesiaMainland ChinaTaiwanSingaporeTerms & ConditionsPrivacy PolicyFair Dealing CommitmentCompliance with Tax RequirementsVulnerability Disclosure Policy©2025 DBS Bank LtdCo. DBS Scam Defence is our multi-layered approach to protecting your money. Our advanced technology and dedicated teams work hand-in-hand around the clock to safeguard your money, while we equip you with the tools and knowledge to stay alert and protect yourself.Our efforts are in line with the Singapore Police Force and National Crime Prevention Council's ACT initiative – Add, Check, Tell – empowering everyone to spot scams early and stay safe.Arming you with knowledgeKnowing how to spot scams can make a big difference. We bring scam education to where you are and also work with government and community partners such as SPF, CSA and IMDA to scale our reach, making anti-scam education more accessible.Scam education in the communityAnti-scam education is built into many of our community touchpoints – from pop-up events to sessions held in our branches – reaching people where they live and gather. In 2023, we launched our POSB Your Neighbourhood Getai series, where scam prevention tips are woven into lively Getai shows, making it easy for active agers and heartland residents to learn about scams. Together with IMDA, we also regularly run digital literacy and anti-scam workshops in neighbourhoods across Singapore. Scam Defence HubOur Scam Defence Hub is your one-stop space for scam awareness. It houses the latest scam alerts, explanations of how common scams work, and practical guides to help you stay protected. Check it out to learn how to better safeguard yourself against scams.Putting security at your fingertipsStay a step ahead of scammers with simple, powerful security tools in digibank. Elevate your security today with four easy actions:Set transaction limits and alertsVisit 'Security Checkup' to set your transaction and payment limits – so even if someone steals your login details, they can't move large sums. Remember to also update your contact details and switch on banking alerts so you can be notified of any suspicious activity.Step 1Log in to digibank mobileStep 2Tap on MoreStep 3Tap on Security Checkup Customise your transaction alert preferences and threshold limits with just a few taps on digibank mobile so you’re informed of all your account activities.Step 1Log in to your digibank, tap on MoreStep 2Under App & Security Settings, tap Manage NotificationsStep 3Customise your alert preferences and threshold limits, tap NextStep 4Review your details and tap DoneCheck for unexpected activity and alertsSpotting a scam early makes all the difference. Log into digibank to regularly review your bank account and card statements. If something doesn't look right, report it to us immediately via our Fraud Hotline at 1800 339 6963.Protect your card(s) with Payment ControlsTake charge of how your cards are used. With Payment Controls, you can enable or disable e-commerce, contactless, overseas and other key transaction types – so you stay in control of every transaction.Step 1 Log in to digibank mobile with your Touch / Face ID or User ID & PINStep 2 Under Home, tap MoreStep 3 Under Manage Cards & Loans, select Payment ControlsStep 4 Select the Card you wish to customise and toggle switch on/offLock your money with digiVaultAdd an extra layer of protection to your savings. With digiVault, you can lock a selected portion of your funds so they cannot be digitally transferred out – even if scammers trick you into sharing your details. Only you can unlock the funds by visiting a DBS/POSB branch or ATM, keeping your savings untouchable by anyone but yourself. How to lock funds in your current and/or savings account(s)Log in to digibank mobile, under Deposits, select your Current/Savings Account Tap Lock with digiVault Tap Lock an Amount and enter the amount you wish to lock Review your details and tap Submit How to lock your Fixed DepositsLog in to digibank mobile, under Deposits, select your Fixed Deposit AccountTap Lock with digiVault and select the placement you wish to lock Review your details and tap Submit How to set up a separate account for lockingLog in to digibank mobile.Tap on the More tab.Select the digiVault under Apply.Follow the steps and start transferring funds in after confirmation.To date, more than 1.5 million customers are already protecting their money with these tools. Don't wait – take control of your security today.Watching over your money 24/7Alongside empowering you with security tools, our dedicated Anti-Scam Team and frontline staff work together to safeguard your money. Specialist Anti-Scam TeamMade up of fraud prevention specialists trained to spot the early signs of scam activity, this dedicated unit reviews high-risk transactions flagged by our fraud monitoring systems and works to protect customers from scams.Frontline staff on alertOur branch and customer service teams undergo regular training to recognise warning signs of scams. They watch for common red flags and if something seems off, they’ll pause the transaction and ask clarifying questions —helping to protect your money before any funds leave your account.24/7 Fraud Monitoring SystemsOur advanced surveillance systems run round-the-clock to detect unusual activity. If something suspicious is flagged, we’ll contact you and may temporarily block transactions to keep your funds safe.Visit our Scam Defence Hub for more online banking safety tips and stay vigilant against scams. You can also keep yourself protected with safeguards such as Safety Switch and the ScamShield app. What Safety Switch doesCall the DBS Fraud Hotline to activate Safety Switch. This instantly disables your digibank Online and Mobile access, DBS PayLah! and all cards, blocking all digital transactions – including local and overseas transfers – until you decide to lift the lock. It’s the fastest way to freeze activity if you think your account details have been compromised.Lock scammers out with the ScamShield appDownload the official ScamShield app to block scam calls and SMSes, as well as report scam calls. It also filters calls based on a list maintained by the Singapore Police Force.RelatedSecurity CheckupStop the phish with DBS Payment ControlsLock your money like you lock your valuablesLet's bank safely togetherExplore moreProtectionSavingsEducationLearnSecurityCybersecurityUseful LinksDeposits GuideDeposit Insurance SchemeTerms & Conditions Governing AccountsLimited Purpose Bank AccountTerms & Conditions Governing Electronic ServicesCheque Deposit FAQsBest Execution PolicyOthersBank, Branch & Transaction CodesFormsRates & ToolsSecurity & YouScheduled MaintenanceUpdate Personal ParticularsLasting Power of AttorneyNeed Help?Help & Support PortalPhone - 1800 111 1111Get In Touch with UsMarketsSingaporeHong KongIndiaIndonesiaMainland ChinaTaiwanSingaporeTerms & ConditionsPrivacy PolicyFair Dealing CommitmentCompliance with Tax RequirementsVulnerability Disclosure Policy©2025 DBS Bank LtdCo. It also filters calls based on a list maintained by the Singapore Police Force. 列表内容: • At a Glance • Arming you with knowledge • Putting security at your fingertips • Watching over your money 24/7 列表内容: • Deposits Guide • Deposit Insurance Scheme • Terms & Conditions Governing Accounts • Limited Purpose Bank Account • Terms & Conditions Governing Electronic Services • Cheque Deposit FAQs • Best Execution Policy 列表内容: • Bank, Branch & Transaction Codes • Rates & Tools • Security & You • Scheduled Maintenance • Update Personal Particulars • Lasting Power of Attorney 列表内容: • Mainland China

title: DBS Scam Defence | DBS Singapore

question: 请解释这句话：{'type': 'number', 'value': '7', 'context': "BankDigital ServicesSecuring your banking transactionsDBS Scam DefenceACT to get the upper hand over scammers.At a GlanceArming you with knowledgePutting security at your fingertipsWatching over your money 24/7BankDigital ServicesSecuring your banking transactionsDBS Scam DefenceNeed help? Just reach out to us.If you suspect a scam, call our DBS Fraud Hotline at 1800 339 6963 (in Singapore) or +65 6339 6963 (from abroad).At a GlanceArming you with knowledgeWe keep you informed and updated on the latest scams, online and on-ground in your community.Putting security at your fingertipsStay a step ahead of scammers with our suite of security tools in digibank.Watching over your money 24/7Our dedicated teams and surveillance systems work around the clock to safeguard your savings.Your security is our priority. DBS Scam Defence is our multi-layered approach to protecting your money. Our advanced technology and dedicated teams work hand-in-hand around the clock to safeguard your money, while we equip you with the tools and knowledge to stay alert and protect yourself.Our efforts are in line with the Singapore Police Force and National Crime Prevention Council's ACT initiative – Add, Check, Tell – empowering everyone to spot scams early and stay safe.Arming you with knowledgeKnowing how to spot scams can make a big difference. We bring scam education to where you are and also work with government and community partners such as SPF, CSA and IMDA to scale our reach, making anti-scam education more accessible.Scam education in the communityAnti-scam education is built into many of our community touchpoints – from pop-up events to sessions held in our branches – reaching people where they live and gather. In 2023, we launched our POSB Your Neighbourhood Getai series, where scam prevention tips are woven into lively Getai shows, making it easy for active agers and heartland residents to learn about scams. Together with IMDA, we also regularly run digital literacy and anti-scam workshops in neighbourhoods across Singapore. Scam Defence HubOur Scam Defence Hub is your one-stop space for scam awareness. It houses the latest scam alerts, explanations of how common scams work, and practical guides to help you stay protected. Check it out to learn how to better safeguard yourself against scams.Putting security at your fingertipsStay a step ahead of scammers with simple, powerful security tools in digibank. Elevate your security today with four easy actions:Set transaction limits and alertsVisit 'Security Checkup' to set your transaction and payment limits – so even if someone steals your login details, they can't move large sums. Remember to also update your contact details and switch on banking alerts so you can be notified of any suspicious activity.Step 1Log in to digibank mobileStep 2Tap on MoreStep 3Tap on Security Checkup Customise your transaction alert preferences and threshold limits with just a few taps on digibank mobile so you’re informed of all your account activities.Step 1Log in to your digibank, tap on MoreStep 2Under App & Security Settings, tap Manage NotificationsStep 3Customise your alert preferences and threshold limits, tap NextStep 4Review your details and tap DoneCheck for unexpected activity and alertsSpotting a scam early makes all the difference. Log into digibank to regularly review your bank account and card statements. If something doesn't look right, report it to us immediately via our Fraud Hotline at 1800 339 6963.Protect your card(s) with Payment ControlsTake charge of how your cards are used. With Payment Controls, you can enable or disable e-commerce, contactless, overseas and other key transaction types – so you stay in control of every transaction.Step 1 Log in to digibank mobile with your Touch / Face ID or User ID & PINStep 2 Under Home, tap MoreStep 3 Under Manage Cards & Loans, select Payment ControlsStep 4 Select the Card you wish to customise and toggle switch on/offLock your money with digiVaultAdd an extra layer of protection to your savings. With digiVault, you can lock a selected portion of your funds so they cannot be digitally transferred out – even if scammers trick you into sharing your details. Only you can unlock the funds by visiting a DBS/POSB branch or ATM, keeping your savings untouchable by anyone but yourself. How to lock funds in your current and/or savings account(s)Log in to digibank mobile, under Deposits, select your Current/Savings Account Tap Lock with digiVault Tap Lock an Amount and enter the amount you wish to lock Review your details and tap Submit How to lock your Fixed DepositsLog in to digibank mobile, under Deposits, select your Fixed Deposit AccountTap Lock with digiVault and select the placement you wish to lock Review your details and tap Submit How to set up a separate account for lockingLog in to digibank mobile.Tap on the More tab.Select the digiVault under Apply.Follow the steps and start transferring funds in after confirmation.To date, more than 1.5 million customers are already protecting their money with these tools. Don't wait – take control of your security today.Watching over your money 24/7Alongside empowering you with security tools, our dedicated Anti-Scam Team and frontline staff work together to safeguard your money. Specialist Anti-Scam TeamMade up of fraud prevention specialists trained to spot the early signs of scam activity, this dedicated unit reviews high-risk transactions flagged by our fraud monitoring systems and works to protect customers from scams.Frontline staff on alertOur branch and customer service teams undergo regular training to recognise warning signs of scams. They watch for common red flags and if something seems off, they’ll pause the transaction and ask clarifying questions —helping to protect your money before any funds leave your account.24/7 Fraud Monitoring SystemsOur advanced surveillance systems run round-the-clock to detect unusual activity. If something suspicious is flagged, we’ll contact you and may temporarily block transactions to keep your funds safe.Visit our Scam Defence Hub for more online banking safety tips and stay vigilant against scams. You can also keep yourself protected with safeguards such as Safety Switch and the ScamShield app. What Safety Switch doesCall the DBS Fraud Hotline to activate Safety Switch. This instantly disables your digibank Online and Mobile access, DBS PayLah! and all cards, blocking all digital transactions – including local and overseas transfers – until you decide to lift the lock. It’s the fastest way to freeze activity if you think your account details have been compromised.Lock scammers out with the ScamShield appDownload the official ScamShield app to block scam calls and SMSes, as well as report scam calls. It also filters calls based on a list maintained by the Singapore Police Force.RelatedSecurity CheckupStop the phish with DBS Payment ControlsLock your money like you lock your valuablesLet's bank safely togetherExplore moreProtectionSavingsEducationLearnSecurityCybersecurityUseful LinksDeposits GuideDeposit Insurance SchemeTerms & Conditions Governing AccountsLimited Purpose Bank AccountTerms & Conditions Governing Electronic ServicesCheque Deposit FAQsBest Execution PolicyOthersBank, Branch & Transaction CodesFormsRates & ToolsSecurity & YouScheduled MaintenanceUpdate Personal ParticularsLasting Power of AttorneyNeed Help?Help & Support PortalPhone - 1800 111 1111Get In Touch with UsMarketsSingaporeHong KongIndiaIndonesiaMainland ChinaTaiwanSingaporeTerms & ConditionsPrivacy PolicyFair Dealing CommitmentCompliance with Tax RequirementsVulnerability Disclosure Policy©2025 DBS Bank LtdCo. of fraud prevention specialists trained to spot the early signs of scam activity, this dedicated unit reviews high-risk transactions flagged by our fraud monitoring systems and works to protect customers from scams. Frontline staff on alertOur branch and customer service teams undergo regular training to recognise warning signs of scams. They watch for common red flags and if something seems off, they’ll pause the transaction and ask clarifying questions —helping to protect your money before any funds leave your account. 24/7 Fraud Monitoring SystemsOur advanced surveillance systems run round-the-clock to detect unusual activity. It’s the fastest way to freeze activity if you think your account details have been compromised. It also filters calls based on a list maintained by the Singapore Police Force. 列表内容: • At a Glance • Arming you with knowledge • Putting security at your fingertips • Watching over your money 24/7 列表内容: • Deposits Guide • Deposit Insurance Scheme • Terms & Conditions Governing Accounts • Limited Purpose Bank Account • Terms & Conditions Governing Electronic Services • Cheque Deposit FAQs • Best Execution Policy 列表内容: • Bank, Branch & Transaction Codes • Rates & Tools • Security & You • Scheduled Maintenance • Update Personal Particulars • Lasting Power of Attorney 列表内容: • Mainland China"}

answer.context: BankDigital ServicesSecuring your banking transactionsDBS Scam DefenceACT to get the upper hand over scammers.At a GlanceArming you with knowledgePutting security at your fingertipsWatching over your money 24/7BankDigital ServicesSecuring your banking transactionsDBS Scam DefenceNeed help? Just reach out to us.If you suspect a scam, call our DBS Fraud Hotline at 1800 339 6963 (in Singapore) or +65 6339 6963 (from abroad).At a GlanceArming you with knowledgeWe keep you informed and updated on the latest scams, online and on-ground in your community.Putting security at your fingertipsStay a step ahead of scammers with our suite of security tools in digibank.Watching over your money 24/7Our dedicated teams and surveillance systems work around the clock to safeguard your savings.Your security is our priority. DBS Scam Defence is our multi-layered approach to protecting your money. Our advanced technology and dedicated teams work hand-in-hand around the clock to safeguard your money, while we equip you with the tools and knowledge to stay alert and protect yourself.Our efforts are in line with the Singapore Police Force and National Crime Prevention Council's ACT initiative – Add, Check, Tell – empowering everyone to spot scams early and stay safe.Arming you with knowledgeKnowing how to spot scams can make a big difference. We bring scam education to where you are and also work with government and community partners such as SPF, CSA and IMDA to scale our reach, making anti-scam education more accessible.Scam education in the communityAnti-scam education is built into many of our community touchpoints – from pop-up events to sessions held in our branches – reaching people where they live and gather. In 2023, we launched our POSB Your Neighbourhood Getai series, where scam prevention tips are woven into lively Getai shows, making it easy for active agers and heartland residents to learn about scams. Together with IMDA, we also regularly run digital literacy and anti-scam workshops in neighbourhoods across Singapore. Scam Defence HubOur Scam Defence Hub is your one-stop space for scam awareness. It houses the latest scam alerts, explanations of how common scams work, and practical guides to help you stay protected. Check it out to learn how to better safeguard yourself against scams.Putting security at your fingertipsStay a step ahead of scammers with simple, powerful security tools in digibank. Elevate your security today with four easy actions:Set transaction limits and alertsVisit 'Security Checkup' to set your transaction and payment limits – so even if someone steals your login details, they can't move large sums. Remember to also update your contact details and switch on banking alerts so you can be notified of any suspicious activity.Step 1Log in to digibank mobileStep 2Tap on MoreStep 3Tap on Security Checkup Customise your transaction alert preferences and threshold limits with just a few taps on digibank mobile so you’re informed of all your account activities.Step 1Log in to your digibank, tap on MoreStep 2Under App & Security Settings, tap Manage NotificationsStep 3Customise your alert preferences and threshold limits, tap NextStep 4Review your details and tap DoneCheck for unexpected activity and alertsSpotting a scam early makes all the difference. Log into digibank to regularly review your bank account and card statements. If something doesn't look right, report it to us immediately via our Fraud Hotline at 1800 339 6963.Protect your card(s) with Payment ControlsTake charge of how your cards are used. With Payment Controls, you can enable or disable e-commerce, contactless, overseas and other key transaction types – so you stay in control of every transaction.Step 1 Log in to digibank mobile with your Touch / Face ID or User ID & PINStep 2 Under Home, tap MoreStep 3 Under Manage Cards & Loans, select Payment ControlsStep 4 Select the Card you wish to customise and toggle switch on/offLock your money with digiVaultAdd an extra layer of protection to your savings. With digiVault, you can lock a selected portion of your funds so they cannot be digitally transferred out – even if scammers trick you into sharing your details. Only you can unlock the funds by visiting a DBS/POSB branch or ATM, keeping your savings untouchable by anyone but yourself. How to lock funds in your current and/or savings account(s)Log in to digibank mobile, under Deposits, select your Current/Savings Account Tap Lock with digiVault Tap Lock an Amount and enter the amount you wish to lock Review your details and tap Submit How to lock your Fixed DepositsLog in to digibank mobile, under Deposits, select your Fixed Deposit AccountTap Lock with digiVault and select the placement you wish to lock Review your details and tap Submit How to set up a separate account for lockingLog in to digibank mobile.Tap on the More tab.Select the digiVault under Apply.Follow the steps and start transferring funds in after confirmation.To date, more than 1.5 million customers are already protecting their money with these tools. Don't wait – take control of your security today.Watching over your money 24/7Alongside empowering you with security tools, our dedicated Anti-Scam Team and frontline staff work together to safeguard your money. Specialist Anti-Scam TeamMade up of fraud prevention specialists trained to spot the early signs of scam activity, this dedicated unit reviews high-risk transactions flagged by our fraud monitoring systems and works to protect customers from scams.Frontline staff on alertOur branch and customer service teams undergo regular training to recognise warning signs of scams. They watch for common red flags and if something seems off, they’ll pause the transaction and ask clarifying questions —helping to protect your money before any funds leave your account.24/7 Fraud Monitoring SystemsOur advanced surveillance systems run round-the-clock to detect unusual activity. If something suspicious is flagged, we’ll contact you and may temporarily block transactions to keep your funds safe.Visit our Scam Defence Hub for more online banking safety tips and stay vigilant against scams. You can also keep yourself protected with safeguards such as Safety Switch and the ScamShield app. What Safety Switch doesCall the DBS Fraud Hotline to activate Safety Switch. This instantly disables your digibank Online and Mobile access, DBS PayLah! and all cards, blocking all digital transactions – including local and overseas transfers – until you decide to lift the lock. It’s the fastest way to freeze activity if you think your account details have been compromised.Lock scammers out with the ScamShield appDownload the official ScamShield app to block scam calls and SMSes, as well as report scam calls. It also filters calls based on a list maintained by the Singapore Police Force.RelatedSecurity CheckupStop the phish with DBS Payment ControlsLock your money like you lock your valuablesLet's bank safely togetherExplore moreProtectionSavingsEducationLearnSecurityCybersecurityUseful LinksDeposits GuideDeposit Insurance SchemeTerms & Conditions Governing AccountsLimited Purpose Bank AccountTerms & Conditions Governing Electronic ServicesCheque Deposit FAQsBest Execution PolicyOthersBank, Branch & Transaction CodesFormsRates & ToolsSecurity & YouScheduled MaintenanceUpdate Personal ParticularsLasting Power of AttorneyNeed Help?Help & Support PortalPhone - 1800 111 1111Get In Touch with UsMarketsSingaporeHong KongIndiaIndonesiaMainland ChinaTaiwanSingaporeTerms & ConditionsPrivacy PolicyFair Dealing CommitmentCompliance with Tax RequirementsVulnerability Disclosure Policy©2025 DBS Bank LtdCo. of fraud prevention specialists trained to spot the early signs of scam activity, this dedicated unit reviews high-risk transactions flagged by our fraud monitoring systems and works to protect customers from scams. Frontline staff on alertOur branch and customer service teams undergo regular training to recognise warning signs of scams. They watch for common red flags and if something seems off, they’ll pause the transaction and ask clarifying questions —helping to protect your money before any funds leave your account. 24/7 Fraud Monitoring SystemsOur advanced surveillance systems run round-the-clock to detect unusual activity. If something suspicious is flagged, we’ll contact you and may temporarily block transactions to keep your funds safe. 表格内容: What Safety Switch doesCall the DBS Fraud Hotline to activate Safety Switch. This instantly disables your digibank Online and Mobile access, DBS PayLah! and all cards, blocking all digital transactions – including local and overseas transfers – until you decide to lift the lock. It’s the fastest way to freeze activity if you think your account details have been compromised. Lock scammers out with the ScamShield appDownload the official ScamShield app to block scam calls and SMSes, as well as report scam calls. It also filters calls based on a list maintained by the Singapore Police Force. 列表内容: • At a Glance • Arming you with knowledge • Putting security at your fingertips • Watching over your money 24/7 列表内容: • Deposits Guide • Deposit Insurance Scheme • Terms & Conditions Governing Accounts • Limited Purpose Bank Account • Terms & Conditions Governing Electronic Services • Cheque Deposit FAQs • Best Execution Policy 列表内容: • Bank, Branch & Transaction Codes • Rates & Tools • Security & You • Scheduled Maintenance • Update Personal Particulars • Lasting Power of Attorney 列表内容: • Mainland China

title: DBS Scam Defence | DBS Singapore

question: 请解释这句话：{'type': 'number', 'value': '6963', 'context': "BankDigital ServicesSecuring your banking transactionsDBS Scam DefenceACT to get the upper hand over scammers.At a GlanceArming you with knowledgePutting security at your fingertipsWatching over your money 24/7BankDigital ServicesSecuring your banking transactionsDBS Scam DefenceNeed help? Just reach out to us.If you suspect a scam, call our DBS Fraud Hotline at 1800 339 6963 (in Singapore) or +65 6339 6963 (from abroad).At a GlanceArming you with knowledgeWe keep you informed and updated on the latest scams, online and on-ground in your community.Putting security at your fingertipsStay a step ahead of scammers with our suite of security tools in digibank.Watching over your money 24/7Our dedicated teams and surveillance systems work around the clock to safeguard your savings.Your security is our priority. DBS Scam Defence is our multi-layered approach to protecting your money. Our advanced technology and dedicated teams work hand-in-hand around the clock to safeguard your money, while we equip you with the tools and knowledge to stay alert and protect yourself.Our efforts are in line with the Singapore Police Force and National Crime Prevention Council's ACT initiative – Add, Check, Tell – empowering everyone to spot scams early and stay safe.Arming you with knowledgeKnowing how to spot scams can make a big difference. We bring scam education to where you are and also work with government and community partners such as SPF, CSA and IMDA to scale our reach, making anti-scam education more accessible.Scam education in the communityAnti-scam education is built into many of our community touchpoints – from pop-up events to sessions held in our branches – reaching people where they live and gather. In 2023, we launched our POSB Your Neighbourhood Getai series, where scam prevention tips are woven into lively Getai shows, making it easy for active agers and heartland residents to learn about scams. Together with IMDA, we also regularly run digital literacy and anti-scam workshops in neighbourhoods across Singapore. Scam Defence HubOur Scam Defence Hub is your one-stop space for scam awareness. It houses the latest scam alerts, explanations of how common scams work, and practical guides to help you stay protected. Check it out to learn how to better safeguard yourself against scams.Putting security at your fingertipsStay a step ahead of scammers with simple, powerful security tools in digibank. Elevate your security today with four easy actions:Set transaction limits and alertsVisit 'Security Checkup' to set your transaction and payment limits – so even if someone steals your login details, they can't move large sums. Remember to also update your contact details and switch on banking alerts so you can be notified of any suspicious activity.Step 1Log in to digibank mobileStep 2Tap on MoreStep 3Tap on Security Checkup Customise your transaction alert preferences and threshold limits with just a few taps on digibank mobile so you’re informed of all your account activities.Step 1Log in to your digibank, tap on MoreStep 2Under App & Security Settings, tap Manage NotificationsStep 3Customise your alert preferences and threshold limits, tap NextStep 4Review your details and tap DoneCheck for unexpected activity and alertsSpotting a scam early makes all the difference. Log into digibank to regularly review your bank account and card statements. If something doesn't look right, report it to us immediately via our Fraud Hotline at 1800 339 6963.Protect your card(s) with Payment ControlsTake charge of how your cards are used. With Payment Controls, you can enable or disable e-commerce, contactless, overseas and other key transaction types – so you stay in control of every transaction.Step 1 Log in to digibank mobile with your Touch / Face ID or User ID & PINStep 2 Under Home, tap MoreStep 3 Under Manage Cards & Loans, select Payment ControlsStep 4 Select the Card you wish to customise and toggle switch on/offLock your money with digiVaultAdd an extra layer of protection to your savings. With digiVault, you can lock a selected portion of your funds so they cannot be digitally transferred out – even if scammers trick you into sharing your details. Only you can unlock the funds by visiting a DBS/POSB branch or ATM, keeping your savings untouchable by anyone but yourself. How to lock funds in your current and/or savings account(s)Log in to digibank mobile, under Deposits, select your Current/Savings Account Tap Lock with digiVault Tap Lock an Amount and enter the amount you wish to lock Review your details and tap Submit How to lock your Fixed DepositsLog in to digibank mobile, under Deposits, select your Fixed Deposit AccountTap Lock with digiVault and select the placement you wish to lock Review your details and tap Submit How to set up a separate account for lockingLog in to digibank mobile.Tap on the More tab.Select the digiVault under Apply.Follow the steps and start transferring funds in after confirmation.To date, more than 1.5 million customers are already protecting their money with these tools. Don't wait – take control of your security today.Watching over your money 24/7Alongside empowering you with security tools, our dedicated Anti-Scam Team and frontline staff work together to safeguard your money. Specialist Anti-Scam TeamMade up of fraud prevention specialists trained to spot the early signs of scam activity, this dedicated unit reviews high-risk transactions flagged by our fraud monitoring systems and works to protect customers from scams.Frontline staff on alertOur branch and customer service teams undergo regular training to recognise warning signs of scams. They watch for common red flags and if something seems off, they’ll pause the transaction and ask clarifying questions —helping to protect your money before any funds leave your account.24/7 Fraud Monitoring SystemsOur advanced surveillance systems run round-the-clock to detect unusual activity. If something suspicious is flagged, we’ll contact you and may temporarily block transactions to keep your funds safe.Visit our Scam Defence Hub for more online banking safety tips and stay vigilant against scams. You can also keep yourself protected with safeguards such as Safety Switch and the ScamShield app. What Safety Switch doesCall the DBS Fraud Hotline to activate Safety Switch. This instantly disables your digibank Online and Mobile access, DBS PayLah! and all cards, blocking all digital transactions – including local and overseas transfers – until you decide to lift the lock. It’s the fastest way to freeze activity if you think your account details have been compromised.Lock scammers out with the ScamShield appDownload the official ScamShield app to block scam calls and SMSes, as well as report scam calls. It also filters calls based on a list maintained by the Singapore Police Force.RelatedSecurity CheckupStop the phish with DBS Payment ControlsLock your money like you lock your valuablesLet's bank safely togetherExplore moreProtectionSavingsEducationLearnSecurityCybersecurityUseful LinksDeposits GuideDeposit Insurance SchemeTerms & Conditions Governing AccountsLimited Purpose Bank AccountTerms & Conditions Governing Electronic ServicesCheque Deposit FAQsBest Execution PolicyOthersBank, Branch & Transaction CodesFormsRates & ToolsSecurity & YouScheduled MaintenanceUpdate Personal ParticularsLasting Power of AttorneyNeed Help?Help & Support PortalPhone - 1800 111 1111Get In Touch with UsMarketsSingaporeHong KongIndiaIndonesiaMainland ChinaTaiwanSingaporeTerms & ConditionsPrivacy PolicyFair Dealing CommitmentCompliance with Tax RequirementsVulnerability Disclosure Policy©2025 DBS Bank LtdCo. This instantly disables your digibank Online and Mobile access, DBS PayLah! and all cards, blocking all digital transactions – including local and overseas transfers – until you decide to lift the lock. It’s the fastest way to freeze activity if you think your account details have been compromised.Lock scammers out with the ScamShield appDownload the official ScamShield app to block scam calls and SMSes, as well as report scam calls. It also filters calls based on a list maintained by the Singapore Police Force.RelatedSecurity CheckupStop the phish with DBS Payment ControlsLock your money like you lock your valuablesLet's bank safely togetherExplore moreProtectionSavingsEducationLearnSecurityCybersecurityUseful LinksDeposits GuideDeposit Insurance SchemeTerms & Conditions Governing AccountsLimited Purpose Bank AccountTerms & Conditions Governing Electronic ServicesCheque Deposit FAQsBest Execution PolicyOthersBank, Branch & Transaction CodesFormsRates & ToolsSecurity & YouScheduled MaintenanceUpdate Personal ParticularsLasting Power of AttorneyNeed Help?Help & Support PortalPhone - 1800 111 1111Get In Touch with UsMarketsSingaporeHong KongIndiaIndonesiaMainland ChinaTaiwanSingaporeTerms & ConditionsPrivacy PolicyFair Dealing CommitmentCompliance with Tax RequirementsVulnerability Disclosure Policy©2025 DBS Bank LtdCo. answer.context: BankDigital ServicesSecuring your banking transactionsDBS Scam DefenceACT to get the upper hand over scammers.At a GlanceArming you with knowledgePutting security at your fingertipsWatching over your money 24/7BankDigital ServicesSecuring your banking transactionsDBS Scam DefenceNeed help? Just reach out to us.If you suspect a scam, call our DBS Fraud Hotline at 1800 339 6963 (in Singapore) or +65 6339 6963 (from abroad).At a GlanceArming you with knowledgeWe keep you informed and updated on the latest scams, online and on-ground in your community.Putting security at your fingertipsStay a step ahead of scammers with our suite of security tools in digibank.Watching over your money 24/7Our dedicated teams and surveillance systems work around the clock to safeguard your savings.Your security is our priority. DBS Scam Defence is our multi-layered approach to protecting your money. Our advanced technology and dedicated teams work hand-in-hand around the clock to safeguard your money, while we equip you with the tools and knowledge to stay alert and protect yourself.Our efforts are in line with the Singapore Police Force and National Crime Prevention Council's ACT initiative – Add, Check, Tell – empowering everyone to spot scams early and stay safe.Arming you with knowledgeKnowing how to spot scams can make a big difference. We bring scam education to where you are and also work with government and community partners such as SPF, CSA and IMDA to scale our reach, making anti-scam education more accessible.Scam education in the communityAnti-scam education is built into many of our community touchpoints – from pop-up events to sessions held in our branches – reaching people where they live and gather. In 2023, we launched our POSB Your Neighbourhood Getai series, where scam prevention tips are woven into lively Getai shows, making it easy for active agers and heartland residents to learn about scams. Together with IMDA, we also regularly run digital literacy and anti-scam workshops in neighbourhoods across Singapore. Scam Defence HubOur Scam Defence Hub is your one-stop space for scam awareness. It houses the latest scam alerts, explanations of how common scams work, and practical guides to help you stay protected. Check it out to learn how to better safeguard yourself against scams.Putting security at your fingertipsStay a step ahead of scammers with simple, powerful security tools in digibank. Elevate your security today with four easy actions:Set transaction limits and alertsVisit 'Security Checkup' to set your transaction and payment limits – so even if someone steals your login details, they can't move large sums. Remember to also update your contact details and switch on banking alerts so you can be notified of any suspicious activity.Step 1Log in to digibank mobileStep 2Tap on MoreStep 3Tap on Security Checkup Customise your transaction alert preferences and threshold limits with just a few taps on digibank mobile so you’re informed of all your account activities.Step 1Log in to your digibank, tap on MoreStep 2Under App & Security Settings, tap Manage NotificationsStep 3Customise your alert preferences and threshold limits, tap NextStep 4Review your details and tap DoneCheck for unexpected activity and alertsSpotting a scam early makes all the difference. Log into digibank to regularly review your bank account and card statements. If something doesn't look right, report it to us immediately via our Fraud Hotline at 1800 339 6963.Protect your card(s) with Payment ControlsTake charge of how your cards are used. With Payment Controls, you can enable or disable e-commerce, contactless, overseas and other key transaction types – so you stay in control of every transaction.Step 1 Log in to digibank mobile with your Touch / Face ID or User ID & PINStep 2 Under Home, tap MoreStep 3 Under Manage Cards & Loans, select Payment ControlsStep 4 Select the Card you wish to customise and toggle switch on/offLock your money with digiVaultAdd an extra layer of protection to your savings. With digiVault, you can lock a selected portion of your funds so they cannot be digitally transferred out – even if scammers trick you into sharing your details. Only you can unlock the funds by visiting a DBS/POSB branch or ATM, keeping your savings untouchable by anyone but yourself. How to lock funds in your current and/or savings account(s)Log in to digibank mobile, under Deposits, select your Current/Savings Account Tap Lock with digiVault Tap Lock an Amount and enter the amount you wish to lock Review your details and tap Submit How to lock your Fixed DepositsLog in to digibank mobile, under Deposits, select your Fixed Deposit AccountTap Lock with digiVault and select the placement you wish to lock Review your details and tap Submit How to set up a separate account for lockingLog in to digibank mobile.Tap on the More tab.Select the digiVault under Apply.Follow the steps and start transferring funds in after confirmation.To date, more than 1.5 million customers are already protecting their money with these tools. Don't wait – take control of your security today.Watching over your money 24/7Alongside empowering you with security tools, our dedicated Anti-Scam Team and frontline staff work together to safeguard your money. Specialist Anti-Scam TeamMade up of fraud prevention specialists trained to spot the early signs of scam activity, this dedicated unit reviews high-risk transactions flagged by our fraud monitoring systems and works to protect customers from scams.Frontline staff on alertOur branch and customer service teams undergo regular training to recognise warning signs of scams. They watch for common red flags and if something seems off, they’ll pause the transaction and ask clarifying questions —helping to protect your money before any funds leave your account.24/7 Fraud Monitoring SystemsOur advanced surveillance systems run round-the-clock to detect unusual activity. If something suspicious is flagged, we’ll contact you and may temporarily block transactions to keep your funds safe.Visit our Scam Defence Hub for more online banking safety tips and stay vigilant against scams. You can also keep yourself protected with safeguards such as Safety Switch and the ScamShield app. What Safety Switch doesCall the DBS Fraud Hotline to activate Safety Switch. This instantly disables your digibank Online and Mobile access, DBS PayLah! and all cards, blocking all digital transactions – including local and overseas transfers – until you decide to lift the lock. It’s the fastest way to freeze activity if you think your account details have been compromised.Lock scammers out with the ScamShield appDownload the official ScamShield app to block scam calls and SMSes, as well as report scam calls. It also filters calls based on a list maintained by the Singapore Police Force.RelatedSecurity CheckupStop the phish with DBS Payment ControlsLock your money like you lock your valuablesLet's bank safely togetherExplore moreProtectionSavingsEducationLearnSecurityCybersecurityUseful LinksDeposits GuideDeposit Insurance SchemeTerms & Conditions Governing AccountsLimited Purpose Bank AccountTerms & Conditions Governing Electronic ServicesCheque Deposit FAQsBest Execution PolicyOthersBank, Branch & Transaction CodesFormsRates & ToolsSecurity & YouScheduled MaintenanceUpdate Personal ParticularsLasting Power of AttorneyNeed Help?Help & Support PortalPhone - 1800 111 1111Get In Touch with UsMarketsSingaporeHong KongIndiaIndonesiaMainland ChinaTaiwanSingaporeTerms & ConditionsPrivacy PolicyFair Dealing CommitmentCompliance with Tax RequirementsVulnerability Disclosure Policy©2025 DBS Bank LtdCo. How to lock funds in your current and/or savings account(s)Log in to digibank mobile, under Deposits, select your Current/Savings Account Tap Lock with digiVault Tap Lock an Amount and enter the amount you wish to lock Review your details and tap Submit How to lock your Fixed DepositsLog in to digibank mobile, under Deposits, select your Fixed Deposit AccountTap Lock with digiVault and select the placement you wish to lock Review your details and tap Submit How to set up a separate account for lockingLog in to digibank mobile.Tap on the More tab.Select the digiVault under Apply.Follow the steps and start transferring funds in after confirmation.To date, more than 1.5 million customers are already protecting their money with these tools. Don't wait – take control of your security today.Watching over your money 24/7Alongside empowering you with security tools, our dedicated Anti-Scam Team and frontline staff work together to safeguard your money. Specialist Anti-Scam TeamMade up of fraud prevention specialists trained to spot the early signs of scam activity, this dedicated unit reviews high-risk transactions flagged by our fraud monitoring systems and works to protect customers from scams.Frontline staff on alertOur branch and customer service teams undergo regular training to recognise warning signs of scams. They watch for common red flags and if something seems off, they’ll pause the transaction and ask clarifying questions —helping to protect your money before any funds leave your account.24/7 Fraud Monitoring SystemsOur advanced surveillance systems run round-the-clock to detect unusual activity. If something suspicious is flagged, we’ll contact you and may temporarily block transactions to keep your funds safe.Visit our Scam Defence Hub for more online banking safety tips and stay vigilant against scams. You can also keep yourself protected with safeguards such as Safety Switch and the ScamShield app. What Safety Switch doesCall the DBS Fraud Hotline to activate Safety Switch. This instantly disables your digibank Online and Mobile access, DBS PayLah! and all cards, blocking all digital transactions – including local and overseas transfers – until you decide to lift the lock. It’s the fastest way to freeze activity if you think your account details have been compromised.Lock scammers out with the ScamShield appDownload the official ScamShield app to block scam calls and SMSes, as well as report scam calls. It also filters calls based on a list maintained by the Singapore Police Force.RelatedSecurity CheckupStop the phish with DBS Payment ControlsLock your money like you lock your valuablesLet's bank safely togetherExplore moreProtectionSavingsEducationLearnSecurityCybersecurityUseful LinksDeposits GuideDeposit Insurance SchemeTerms & Conditions Governing AccountsLimited Purpose Bank AccountTerms & Conditions Governing Electronic ServicesCheque Deposit FAQsBest Execution PolicyOthersBank, Branch & Transaction CodesFormsRates & ToolsSecurity & YouScheduled MaintenanceUpdate Personal ParticularsLasting Power of AttorneyNeed Help?Help & Support PortalPhone - 1800 111 1111Get In Touch with UsMarketsSingaporeHong KongIndiaIndonesiaMainland ChinaTaiwanSingaporeTerms & ConditionsPrivacy PolicyFair Dealing CommitmentCompliance with Tax RequirementsVulnerability Disclosure Policy©2025 DBS Bank LtdCo. Remember to also update your contact details and switch on banking alerts so you can be notified of any suspicious activity.Step 1Log in to digibank mobileStep 2Tap on MoreStep 3Tap on Security Checkup Customise your transaction alert preferences and threshold limits with just a few taps on digibank mobile so you’re informed of all your account activities.Step 1Log in to your digibank, tap on MoreStep 2Under App & Security Settings, tap Manage NotificationsStep 3Customise your alert preferences and threshold limits, tap NextStep 4Review your details and tap DoneCheck for unexpected activity and alertsSpotting a scam early makes all the difference. Log into digibank to regularly review your bank account and card statements. If something doesn't look right, report it to us immediately via our Fraud Hotline at 1800 339 6963.Protect your card(s) with Payment ControlsTake charge of how your cards are used. With Payment Controls, you can enable or disable e-commerce, contactless, overseas and other key transaction types – so you stay in control of every transaction.Step 1 Log in to digibank mobile with your Touch / Face ID or User ID & PINStep 2 Under Home, tap MoreStep 3 Under Manage Cards & Loans, select Payment ControlsStep 4 Select the Card you wish to customise and toggle switch on/offLock your money with digiVaultAdd an extra layer of protection to your savings. With digiVault, you can lock a selected portion of your funds so they cannot be digitally transferred out – even if scammers trick you into sharing your details. Only you can unlock the funds by visiting a DBS/POSB branch or ATM, keeping your savings untouchable by anyone but yourself. How to lock funds in your current and/or savings account(s)Log in to digibank mobile, under Deposits, select your Current/Savings Account Tap Lock with digiVault Tap Lock an Amount and enter the amount you wish to lock Review your details and tap Submit How to lock your Fixed DepositsLog in to digibank mobile, under Deposits, select your Fixed Deposit AccountTap Lock with digiVault and select the placement you wish to lock Review your details and tap Submit How to set up a separate account for lockingLog in to digibank mobile.Tap on the More tab.Select the digiVault under Apply.Follow the steps and start transferring funds in after confirmation.To date, more than 1.5 million customers are already protecting their money with these tools. Don't wait – take control of your security today.Watching over your money 24/7Alongside empowering you with security tools, our dedicated Anti-Scam Team and frontline staff work together to safeguard your money. Specialist Anti-Scam TeamMade up of fraud prevention specialists trained to spot the early signs of scam activity, this dedicated unit reviews high-risk transactions flagged by our fraud monitoring systems and works to protect customers from scams.Frontline staff on alertOur branch and customer service teams undergo regular training to recognise warning signs of scams. They watch for common red flags and if something seems off, they’ll pause the transaction and ask clarifying questions —helping to protect your money before any funds leave your account.24/7 Fraud Monitoring SystemsOur advanced surveillance systems run round-the-clock to detect unusual activity. If something suspicious is flagged, we’ll contact you and may temporarily block transactions to keep your funds safe.Visit our Scam Defence Hub for more online banking safety tips and stay vigilant against scams. You can also keep yourself protected with safeguards such as Safety Switch and the ScamShield app. What Safety Switch doesCall the DBS Fraud Hotline to activate Safety Switch. This instantly disables your digibank Online and Mobile access, DBS PayLah! and all cards, blocking all digital transactions – including local and overseas transfers – until you decide to lift the lock. It’s the fastest way to freeze activity if you think your account details have been compromised.Lock scammers out with the ScamShield appDownload the official ScamShield app to block scam calls and SMSes, as well as report scam calls. It also filters calls based on a list maintained by the Singapore Police Force.RelatedSecurity CheckupStop the phish with DBS Payment ControlsLock your money like you lock your valuablesLet's bank safely togetherExplore moreProtectionSavingsEducationLearnSecurityCybersecurityUseful LinksDeposits GuideDeposit Insurance SchemeTerms & Conditions Governing AccountsLimited Purpose Bank AccountTerms & Conditions Governing Electronic ServicesCheque Deposit FAQsBest Execution PolicyOthersBank, Branch & Transaction CodesFormsRates & ToolsSecurity & YouScheduled MaintenanceUpdate Personal ParticularsLasting Power of AttorneyNeed Help?Help & Support PortalPhone - 1800 111 1111Get In Touch with UsMarketsSingaporeHong KongIndiaIndonesiaMainland ChinaTaiwanSingaporeTerms & ConditionsPrivacy PolicyFair Dealing CommitmentCompliance with Tax RequirementsVulnerability Disclosure Policy©2025 DBS Bank LtdCo.
